name: rosie
text: I love Beef's "that's so hardcore" expression in the last panel.

name: coldfrog
text: Yeah, especially considering how pleased he is in panel 7.  Even he was awed by the badassery displayed today.

name: cailetshadow
text:
This is the same expression Olympic judges have when a gymnast flips off a bar and just crashes through the roof of the stadium and never comes back down.
Cornelius' finale is equivalent.

name: siolre
text: This deserves far more chubbies than it has.

name: dovey
text: Did my part

name: the_voice
text: Chubbed.

name: the_voice
text: And one for you, pointer-outer of harsh injustice.

name: setzkin
text: Beef has no lines in this strip.

name: wartooth
text: who needs em, with emotions like that?

name: william
text: the idea of somebody being so old school they drive a medieval school bus just completely rocks my face off.

name: joeyramoney
text: A comment left by joeyramoney was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Contrasoma, apocowarg, lamboyster, riotdejaneiro, goocifer, songbirdspectre, GMM, _cheesekayke, Xerol, MortisInvictus, BrianNotBrian, Toebone, yaegmenthor)

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, johnnybaverage, Dovey, Vymora, RiazM, apocowarg, lamboyster, saddestking, riotdejaneiro, Cyberbob, goatmasterflash, mattbeetee, glorify, Mangtastic, Deusoma, 7th_shot, mashisoyo, Avery86, goocifer, TonyHighwind, songbirdspectre, DESTROY_YOU, jollysaintpete, Bungdeetle, MortisInvictus, hrbobhope, DougTheHead, atticusonline, meowmix, Sleaw, LordPretzel, HolyQ, godfatherofsouls, RBisme, aHatOfPig, Magb, DanS, mountain, Zem, choosebro, Jewpacabra, whoppin, charchar, MrPoopytime, captneko, spry, littlefatdog, yaegmenthor, NumberKillinger, greyfield, QuantumCasaba, slalvation, Rakadin, Tipist, morbo)

name: hassanoleary
text:
I actually tried to lame this comment, and failed, resulting in a chubby.

I apologize to all involved.

name: rowboat
text: We can only hope that this is what also happened to the four other people who chubbied it. Surely they didn't mean to.

name: slab64
text:
Relax, dude. He's just practicing his Knuckle Headz language so he can sound like Little Vinnie.

It's da PDF dat most kids got!

name: kochipoik
text: In NZ, in your high school exams, you're allowed to use text language, so he probably excelled in NCEA.

name: charchar
text: Wait, you're allowed to do that? What the hell, people

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
NO KIDDING.

Hell, I've had teachers that docked me points for using an AMPERSAND (&) instead of writing out "and."

I even draw/write it correctly. None of that plus sign bullshit.

name: stereo
text:
Sheesh, I've lost marks for using "they"/"their" in place of a singular-non-gender-specific-pronoun, even though there isn't one .

I regret not living in New Zealand.

name: supahlovah
text:
Correct english practice would be to use "him" or "his", although "they" and "their" are also technically correct.

I'm doubting this is helpful after a year, but just sayin'.

name: atticusonline
text: Wow, Saint. Fuck you.

name: soticoto
text: No, FUCKYOU!

name: tonyhighwind
text:
This is a a comic that makes frequent use of hella, dogg, "we doin' this," and various other linguistic anomalies.

You just kirked out over 1/3 of Tap Dat Ass.

Pick your battles, Saint.

name: utv
text: Saint, I don't know if that last sentence is meant to be a 300 reference, but if so, you have no business going off on anybody for the way they speak.

name: saint
text:
God, what a douche. Am I right?

hint: I am

name: bookofsand
text: Man, Lyle is a great loser. He accepts defeat with grace and composure, knowing that within 75 minutes he will be in the middle of a furious blackout.

name: hexjumper
text: It is kind of curious, I have to admit - perhaps every reprobate has one area in which he's unfailingly noble, and for Lyle, that's in losing graciously when he knows that it was his own fault.

name: cdl146
text: 75? You're being generous.

name: cleave
text: You're forgetting Cornelius' verbose missive yet to be read.

name: thatskotkid
text: Some frumpy speech is going to stop Lyle getting his slant on?  I think not.

name: wae
text:
When one "wins" the sort of contests that Lyle does, they are, more often than not, considered Losers.

Except for the football thing. It's not like these things happen by not caring.

name: agika
text: A comment left by agika was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ishuta, 21echoes, Cyberbob, atom, DeimosRising, fosters, Howard, Godlord2, aesop_punk, Zem, bixschmix, Doc_Rostov)

name: envika
text: the fuck you say that for?

name: shrewdinvestor
text: I just realized Cornelius isn't wearing an apron, he's wearing a  wife beater over his formal attire. Badass as all hell.

name: heatbag
text: Transit strikes can be a blessing.

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nbgreene, joeyramoney, 21echoes, evolume, fosters, gormster, Lumus, Zem)

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
"you folded with a focus and intensity normally seen only in successes" makes this a 5 for me.

the yellow bus with gothic arch windows didn't hurt either.

name: ferdinand
text: i use that line every chance i get.

name: quantumcasaba
text: As do I.

name: lolsworth
text: I have had no chance yet. I wait. Like a cat.

name: vreeeee
text:
"you've been to prison more times than the neck tattoo fairy."

so simple, so offhand, and yet there's more funny in that one tiny remark than in twenty year's worth of Garfield. THIS is why Achewood is incredible.

name: whuppins
text: The dude prepared remarks.

name: sargasm
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HE HAS A LUNCHBOX WITH A SCENE FROM HIS FAVORITE MOLIERE PLAY ON IT

name: falseprophet
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HE DOES ALL HIS HOMEWORK IN LIBRETTOS!

name: tellumo
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HIS LOCKER COMBINATION IS XVII-IX-XXI!

name: trollcollins
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HIS YEARBOOK PICTURE IS A REGENCY WOODCUT.

name: catgrl131
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HE SAT BEHIND JESUS IN THE THIRD GRADE AND SAW HIM CHEAT OFF JUDAS'S TEST!

name: tellumo
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HIS HOMEROOM TEACHER WAS THOMAS AQUINAS!

name: abe
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HE CARVED THE ROSETTA STONE TO CHEAT ON HIS GREEK FINAL!

name: tellumo
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HE USED A GRAPHING ABACUS IN ALGEBRA CLASS!

name: atticusonline
text: Ah yes the aforemention TI-XCV

name: catgrl131
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HIS SCIENCE PROJECT WAS INVENTING THE WHEEL!

name: echidnaboy
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HE BROUGHT A BRONTOSAURUS TO SHOW AND TELL!

name: gmm
text:
I enjoyed this comments thread a lot. Good work, Acheworld.

I mean: THIS MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL, HE DISCOVERED CHINA AS GEOGRAPHY HOMEWORK.

name: stereo
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL, HE HELPED DESIGN MOUNT EVEREST.

name: goatmasterflash
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL, I SAW HIM SETTING UP THE AUDITORIUM FOR THE OPENING CEREMONIES OF HIS 50 YEAR CLASS REUNION WHEN I DROPPED YOU OFF IN THE CAR OF PAIN.

name: atticusonline
text:
THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL, HE PLAYS TENNIS.

oh, that one wasn't very good at all.

i am not seeink where you haf the right attitude philippe. try use bigger adjectiffs. MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL, HE MASTERBATED TO MARTHA WASHINGTON FEVERISHLY. is so goot

name: peppill
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL, HE DID NOT HAVE HISTORY CLASS!

name: catgrl131
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL, HE WAS HISTORY CLASS!

name: atticusonline
text: MAN IS BEINK SO OLD SCHOOL, HE IS STILL RUNNINK ON VACUUM TUBES

name: tekende
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL, HE PROOF-READ THE BOOK OF GENESIS!

name: soticoto
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL THE EOCENE THERMAL MAXIMUM WAS HIS SUMMER BREAK!

name: tekende
text: Listen, you're showing up in my inbox a lot. You need to stop responding to me; I don't want people to get the idea that I have anything at all to do with you, you know?

name: soticoto
text:
Then you shouldn't post so much. The solution is just staring you in the face.

Besides... THIS was one of the worse places you could have chosen to mention that.

name: anzio
text: THE MAN IS SO OLD SCHOOL HE SAW THE DAY THE CLOWN CRIED!

name: aliiis
text: this owns

name: centipede_damascus
text: Cornelius is so badass, he doesn't rub it in other people's faces. They rub it in their own faces for him.

name: behka
text: everytime i read this strip i want to listen to RATM's 'the ghost of tom joad'.

name: cousinted
text: All driving down the street at the posted speed limit, playing Wagner at a high yet reasonable volume.

name: jackparsons
text: Cornelius would know to play Gregorian Chants or Madrigals. Nobody knows what they sounded like, but he does.

name: ttagxamm
text: It is fortunate for Cornelius's rivals that none of them truly contested for the win: dead heats are settled with a martial challenge , and I think it is clear who would have nonetheless prevailed.

name: tekende
text: I read that as "marital challenge" for a moment and wasn't sure what you were getting at.

name: ttagxamm
text: Indeed I considered carefully whether to link the article above or to the similarly titled "Self-defence with a Walking-stick: The Different Methods of Defending Oneself with a Walking-Stick or Umbrella when Affianced under Unequal Conditions (PartI)"

name: gormster
text: Vlad and the Weinermobile had a falling out.

name: killingthejay
text: someone needs to photoshop that schoolbus.

name: zem
text:
I did this and hacked it into the next strip
you're welcome

name: laserblade
text: Wow man, that must be like the leetest hack ever attempted.

name: hypoluxa
text:
As has been noted, the last panel is fantastic.

I love how Ray yells that at them.
He and Beef are so amazed by just how badass Mr. Bear is, that it makes them angry.

name: catgrl131
text:
Nice avatar
Oh, wait!
Mine's cooler
OH SNAP!
I AM YOUR MOTHER AND I TOOK YOU TO SCHOOL IN THE CAR OF PAIN!

name: catgrl131
text:
I'm sorry.
That was uncalled for.

name: catgrl131
text: To clarify for y'all, this is back when I had the Ultra Peanut version of his avicon. Anyhoo, proceed

name: jandruff
text: I have never laughed so hard this week.

name: epicurus
text: Panel 2's dialogue is not a bad one to bust on an employee or something in order to tell them they fucked up without hurting their feelings.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Tuesday Blogs

Pat: Car ride idiot

name: sparhawk
text:
Beef was so overwhelmed by Cornelius' success he cold pulled his shorts down.

The expression on his face in the last panel is precipitated by the cool breeze on his R.H.C.C.

name: ham_shoes
text: Well, Sparhawk, that certainly is a very personal expression

name: tdoom
text: DID YOU HEAR THAT?! THE DUDE PREPARED REMARKS!

name: puguglypress
text: Beef doesn't know what face to make, so he makes that one.

name: deusoma
text: This is it, boys. This is the strip that started the tired, unfunny, Chuck Norris Fact-style joke that every single thing Cornelius Bear does has something to do with his being a badass. Putting that aside, I have to admit it's a good strip, I just wish it didn't lead to such lameness.

name: abe
text: SILENCE!
